title: If I Were Free

tokens.lyric: If I were free to speak my mind,

lines.raw: [E]If I were free to speak my mind,

tokens.lyric: I'd tell a tale to all mankind.

lines.raw: [B7]I'd tell a tale to all mankind.

tokens.lyric: Of how the flowers do bloom and fade,

lines.raw: [E]Of how the flowers do bloom and fade,

tokens.lyric: Of how we fought and how we gained.

lines.raw: [E7]Of how we fought and how we gained.

tokens.lyric: This weary world has had its fill

lines.raw: [A]This weary world has had its fill

tokens.lyric: Of words of war on ev'ry hill.

lines.raw: [B7]Of words of war on ev'ry hill.

tokens.lyric: The time has come for peaceful days

lines.raw: [E]The time has come for peaceful days

tokens.lyric: For peaceful men and peaceful ways.
When all mankind has ceased to fight

lines.raw: [A]When all mankind has ceased to fight

tokens.lyric: I'll raise my head in thanks each night.

lines.raw: [B7]I'll raise my head in thanks each night.

tokens.lyric: For this great love and all it means,

lines.raw: [E]For this great love and all it means,

tokens.lyric: For golden days and peaceful dreams.
If I were free to speak my mind,

lines.raw: [A]If I were free to speak my mind,

tokens.lyric: I'd tell a tale to all mankind.

lines.raw: [B7]I'd tell a tale to all mankind.

tokens.lyric: Of how the flowers do bloom and fade,

lines.raw: [E]Of how the flowers do bloom and fade,

tokens.lyric: Of how we fought and how we gained.

lines.raw: [E7]Of how we fought and how we gained.

source:
{title: If I Were Free}
{key: E}

{section: Verse 1}
[E]If I were free to speak my mind,
[B7]I'd tell a tale to all mankind.
[E]Of how the flowers do bloom and fade,
[E7]Of how we fought and how we gained.

{section: Verse 2}
[A]This weary world has had its fill
[B7]Of words of war on ev'ry hill.
[E]The time has come for peaceful days
[E7]For peaceful men and peaceful ways.

{{section: Verse 3}
[A]When all mankind has ceased to fight
[B7]I'll raise my head in thanks each night.
[E]For this great love and all it means,
[E7]For golden days and peaceful dreams.

{{section: Verse 4}
[A]If I were free to speak my mind,
[B7]I'd tell a tale to all mankind.
[E]Of how the flowers do bloom and fade,
[E7]Of how we fought and how we gained.
